reviews.review_msg: Extremely unorganized and unfair prof.  Her marking is extremely subjective.  You really have to make an effort to get in her good books otherwise you have not even an outside shot of doing well

Logan is ok at best. He is hard to reach and his email skills are the worst. The class is easy and he is a fair marker. However, he is very belittling and wont take the time of day to communicate. He makes no exceptions and is not flexible at all. would recommend this prof if you plan on having very little to no interaction with the prof.
